      • createCompany

        public boolean createCompany(Company company)
                      throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which tries to create a new company.
        Parameters:
        company - A Company object to create.
        Returns:
        True if the company was created successfully.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when a company with the same name already exists.

      • removeCompany

        public boolean removeCompany(Company company)
                      throws MyCouponSystemException
        Removes a Company with all of its coupons and all of the linked coupons of that company.
        Parameters:
        company - A Company to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the company was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if received company does not exist in the DB.

      • updateCompany

        public boolean updateCompany(Company company)
                      throws MyCouponSystemException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the company info was updated.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happens company Id is null.

                     throws MyCouponSystemException

        Parameters:
        coupon - A coupon to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if the received coupon does not exist in the DB.

                   throws MyCouponSystemException
        Returns a Company from the DB by its Id.
        Parameters:
        id - An ID of a company to get.
        Returns:
        A company with received ID. Null if Couldn't get the company.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the received id is null;

                           throws MyCouponSystemException

        Returns:
        True if all the companies were removed.

        Returns:
        True if all the customers were removed.

      • createCustomer

        public boolean createCustomer(Customer customer)
                       throws MyCouponSystemException
        Creates a new customer. cannot create a customer with the same name as an existing one.
        Parameters:
        customer - A Customer to try to create.
        Returns:
        True if the customer was created.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the new customer name already exists in the DB.

      • removeCustomer

        Parameters:
        customer - A customer to delete.
        Returns:
        True if the customer was removed
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the customer to delete does not exist in DB.

      • updateCustomer

        Parameters:
        customer - An existing customer with changed info to update.
        Returns:
        True if the customer was updated.
        Throws:

      • login

        public long login(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws LoginException
        A function to check for login info of admin
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientService
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the admin.
        password - Password of the admin.
        Returns:
        1, as the admin does not have id.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Can happen when there is no customer with the same name and password in DB.
